_sText:
Hey guys! Here's my new map, I made in about 1 month: Placed in a dust scenario, it is a fast paced map for fast elimination rounds on GunGame. There's a lot of cover in the middle and in the place between the houses... I hope i have balanced this map well, so this was what i was most of the time working on, excpect of adding some detail around and getting the custom textures work... So hope you will enjoy playing this map!
Credits: -offroad
Installation: copy the file to maps in counterstrike source/cstrike example: x:\program files\steam\steamapps\yourusername\counterstrike source\cstrike\maps
See my other maps here
